Our latest listing is a 2-bedroom mid-terrace house located in Newcastle Upon Tyne. It is conveniently close to essential amenities, offers strong potential for rental returns, and has a tenant in residence.\r
\r
For investors looking to expand their portfolio, this is a fantastic opportunity!\r
\r
This well-maintained property offers two bedrooms, a spacious lounge, a kitchen with dining room, and a bathroom with a separate WC. Residents also benefit from a private driveway parking, and a private rear garden.\r
\r
Investment details\r
\r
It currently generates an annual gross income of Â£7,800, with tenants currently residing there. Considering the purchase price and the potential rental income that could be earned in future years, this will make for a worthwhile addition to an investor's property portfolio.\r
\r
Please see the Let Property Pack linked below for greater details on this property's investment potential.\r
\r
If you are interested, please call us.\r
\r
Tenancy Details\r
\r
The current tenants have been residing in the property for several years and have consistently paid their rent on time. They do not plan to move out and wish to continue their tenancy.\r
\r
Let Property is committed to facilitating a smooth transaction process between buyer and seller. To ensure maximum commitment to the sale from both parties, a Buyer's Premium will be applied to secure a property.

Welcome to Stapleford Close - This extended three-bedroom home offers stylish, modern living, ideal for first-time buyers or growing families. With the added convenience of a driveway and garage, off-street parking is taken care of.

Upon entering, you're welcomed by a bright entrance hall, perfect for kicking off your shoes and stepping into comfort. Immediately to the left is a conveniently located downstairs WC, ideal for guests.

Further inside, youâll discover a generous living space featuring well-maintained carpets and a cosy fireplace, perfect for relaxing evenings. From the living room, step into the modern kitchen, bathed in natural light and designed to create a warm, inviting atmosphere.

At the rear of the kitchen is the homeâs extension, currently used as a dining room. This versatile space can suit a variety of purposes and offers direct access to the rear garden. Outside, you'll find a combination of decking and lawn, perfect for gardening enthusiasts, summer BBQs, or a safe play area for children.

Upstairs, the home continues to impress with a sleek, modern bathroom fully tiled on both walls and floors.

The second bedroom comfortably fits a double bed and enjoys plenty of natural light. At the front of the house is the spacious master bedroom, complete with a private en-suite featuring a shower. The third bedroom is perfectly suited for flexible use, as a single bedroom, home office, or nursery.

36 Stapleford Close is a beautifully maintained home, ready for its next chapter. With modern finishes and extended living space It truly ticks all the boxes for comfortable, contemporary living.

If you are interested in the property please call our friendly West Road office to book a viewing.Â

Tenure: Freehold
Council Tax Band: C (Newcastle)
EPC: C

Situated in Slatyford to the north west of Newcastle upon Tyne, this home benefits from excellent road access via the A69, A1 North and South with links to Newcastle city centre, the Metro Centre, St James' Retail Park and Kingston Park Retail plus other amenities closer to hand. Locally on Slatyford Lane there is a medical centre, the Denton Burn Community Association & the Residents Association and nearby on West Road there is a supermarket, hairdresser, cafe, sandwich shop, Denton Burn Library and family friendly pub The Denton. Less than a mile away is the St James' Retail Park where there are stores such as Lidl, Iceland, Costa, Wickes, and a B&M Bargains. There are several locals schools within the close vicinity with easy access. Newcastle International Airport is less than 5 miles away.

This charming, three-bedroom, terraced home is located on Gofton Walk, in West Denton. The property will appeal to a range of buyers, including first-time buyers and growing families.

The location is great for easy access to a wealth of amenities. The property is within walking distance of West Denton Retail Park, which offers a variety of shops. There are also several schools nearby, making it a great option for families. For those who enjoy leisure activities, the area is home to parks and recreational facilities, ensuring plenty of outdoor space for all ages. In addition, excellent transport links including regular bus routes and easy access to the A1 Motorway provide quick connections to Newcastle city centre and surrounding areas.

Inside, the property has a welcoming entrance hallway, with a convenient ground-floor WC and additional storage, a bright and airy lounge and a modern kitchen-dining room which is well-equipped with a range of wall and floor units, an integrated oven and hob, and French doors leading to the rear garden. Upstairs, there are three good-sized bedrooms, offering ample space and there is a family bathroom WC with an overhead shower. Further benefits include gas central heating and double glazing.

Externally, the property features a paved garden to the front, creating a neat and tidy entrance. The rear garden is low-maintenance, with a raised decked area that is perfect for outdoor dining or relaxing.

For more information and to book your viewing please call our team on .

Nestled in the charming area of Earsdon Close, West Denton, this delightful three-bedroom house offers a perfect blend of comfort and practicality. Spanning an impressive 936 square feet, the property is ideal for families, couples and first time buyers.

Upon entering, you are welcomed into a well-proportioned open plan dining and kitchen with plenty of cupboard space.. Convenient, W.C On the ground floor. Laminate throughout. Large kitchen with a new oven and hob.

The house features three generously sized bedrooms, providing ample space for family members or guests. . The well-appointed bathroom is conveniently located, with an electric shower over the bath.

West Facing Garden. Shed to the rear for Storage.

Earsdon Close is situated in a friendly neighbourhood, known for its community spirit and accessibility to local amenities. Residents can enjoy nearby parks, schools, and shops, making it an ideal location for families and professionals alike.

sale_listings.description:
A charming and beautifully presented mid-terraced home that is sure to appeal to a wide range of buyers, from first-time purchasers to growing families and those seeking a well-connected home in a desirable setting.

Upon entering, you are welcomed by a delightful entrance hallway, enhanced with decorative faux panelling to dado rail height, setting the tone for the style found within the remainder of the home. The lounge is particularly inviting, featuring a stunning focal point fireplace, elegant coving, plaster detailing to the ceiling, and a central ceiling rose which adds a touch of period charm. Double doors open seamlessly into the spacious open-plan dining kitchen, creating an excellent flow for both everyday living and entertaining.

The dining kitchen itself is well-equipped with a range of wall and base units, offering ample storage and workspace. There is space for the inclusion of essential kitchen appliances, and the room comfortably accommodates a dining table and chairs, making it a perfect family hub. Patio doors lead directly out to the rear garden. A convenient downstairs WC completes the ground floor accommodation.

To the first floor, the property boasts three well-proportioned bedrooms. Two of the bedrooms benefit from fitted sliding door wardrobes, providing practical storage solutions. The family bathroom has been recently refurbished and comprises a white suite with shower facilities over the bath, ensuring it is both stylish and functional.

Externally, the rear garden has been thoughtfully designed with low maintenance in mind. It features two decked patio areas, both laid with artificial lawn, an additional artificial lawned section, and gravelled walkways, creating versatile zones.

The property is ideally located, with a variety of local amenities and facilities nearby. Transport links provide convenient commuter access to surrounding towns and cities.

This home truly combines comfort, practicality, and character, making it an excellent choice for buyers looking for a ready-to-move-into property with plenty of charm.

Nestled in the charming area of Dayshield, Newcastle Upon Tyne, this delightful three-bedroom end terraced house presents an excellent opportunity for both investors and first-time buyers. The property boasts a spacious lounge area, perfect for relaxing or entertaining guests, providing a warm and inviting atmosphere.

The three well-proportioned bedrooms offer ample space for family living or guest accommodation, ensuring comfort for all. The house features a bathroom with walk in shower, while the rear garden provides a lovely outdoor space for gardening, play, or simply enjoying the fresh air.

Although the property requires some updating, this presents a fantastic chance for buyers to personalise their new home to their taste and style. With a little creativity and effort, this house can be transformed into a stunning residence that reflects your individual preferences.

Situated in a friendly neighbourhood, this home is conveniently located near local amenities, schools, and transport links, making it an ideal choice for families and professionals alike. Whether you are looking to invest in a property with great potential or seeking your first home, this end terraced house in Dayshield is a promising option that should not be overlooked.

EPC - D
Council tax - Band A

Hunters would like to welcome to the market this 3 bedroom end terraced property in Dayshield.

** Video Tour on our YouTube Channel **

This beautifully presented, three-bedroom, semi-detached family home, is positioned on Garthfield Crescent in Westerhope.

The location is close to a wealth of amenities, including a supermarket, independent shops, and popular restaurants. Green spaces and parks are close by, offering ideal spots for leisure and relaxation. Excellent transport links provide easy access to Newcastle City Centre and surrounding areas, with regular bus services and quick access to the A1 - perfect for commuters. Westerhope offers a well-connected, community-focused lifestyle. For the growing family there are also schools within easy reach.

The accommodation briefly comprises to the ground floor: welcoming entrance porch and WC, hallway with turn-around staircase and storage under the stairs; bright and airy lounge dining room with dual aspect windows and a fitted kitchen with a range of top and floor units providing ample storage space, integrated oven and hob and there is also access to the rear. To the first floor there are three good sized bedrooms, two with fitted wardrobes, and there is a modern family bathroom WC with four-piece suite. Further benefits include gas central heating, double glazing, solar panels and a CCTV system is installed.

Externally, there is an easy to maintain garden to the front along with a driveway leading to the detached garage, which has been plumbed for two washers and also has a sink. There is also a charming side garden, an easy to maintain garden to the rear and external storage.

We anticipate a high level of interest in this delightful property. For more information and to book a viewing, please, call our team on .

Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac within the established residential neighbourhood of Cowgate, just west of Newcastle city centre,Â is a well-presented one-bedroom end-terrace house, that offers a fantastic opportunity for first-time buyers, downsizers, or buy-to-let investors. The property enjoys a peaceful setting while remaining close to a wide range of local amenities and transport links.

Internally, the home features a bright and welcoming living room with large windows and a neutral colour scheme, creating a cosy and relaxing atmosphere. The adjoining kitchen is practical and well-equipped, offering modern cabinetry, generous worktop space, and room for free-standing appliances. Upstairs, the spacious double bedroom overlooks the front aspect and provides ample space for wardrobes and additional furniture, while the bathroom is fitted with a clean and contemporary three-piece suite including a bath with overhead shower, wash basin, and WC. Outside, the property benefits from a private, low-maintenance garden wrapping around the side, perfect for outdoor seating , and an allocated off-street parking space.

Cowgate itself is a well-connected area, with a range of nearby shops, local schools, and regular bus services offering easy access into Newcastle city centre, just under three miles away. The nearby A167 and A1 Western Bypass make commuting convenient, while surrounding green spaces such as Nuns Moor Park and the Town Moor provide excellent opportunities for recreation. With gas central heating, double glazing, and a welcoming community feel, this end-terrace home combines comfort, practicality, and locationâmaking it an ideal choice for those seeking affordable living within easy reach of everything Newcastle has to offer.

\rOffered to the market with no upper chain this well presented three bedroom terrace house on Rowedge Walk central Westerhope.

Rowedge Walk is located off North Avenue close to Westerhope village centre. Westerhope and the surrounding areas provides an excellent range of local services including schools, shops, library, swimming pool and other leisure facilities, all of which are just a short walk away. There are regular bus routes into Newcastle city centre as well as the Metro centre and Freeman Hospital. The A69 and A1 are both close at hand ensuring convenient transport links. The airport is also within easy reach.

Comprising briefly, entrance hallway, stairs to first floor, lounge with feature fire surround, kitchen diner with range of wall, floor and drawer units, gas oven and hob, door to rear garden.
To the first floor three spacious bedrooms, family bathroom with separate toilet.

The property has been thoughtfully updated to provide contemporary open plan living with the added bonus of a lovely rear garden.

In addition the property benefits from double glazing and gas central heating. Viewing is recommended to appreciate the accommodation.

Comprising to the ground floor entrance porch, open plan lounge and dining area with double doors to the rear garden, beautifully finished kitchen/dining room with ample space for dining and further access to rear garden. There is also a downstairs WC.

To the first floor there are four bedrooms, three of which benefit from built in wardrobes and the master has an en suite shower room. The accommodation is completed by the family bathroom/wc comprising of a three piece white suite.

Externally there are pleasant gardens to rear comprising of patio and lawn areas. To the front there is off street parking via the driveway with space for numerous cars and access to the integral garage.

Windsor Gardens is in a great position with numerous local services close at hand and great transport links, including the A69 and A1 trunk roads, as well as bus links directly into Newcastle City Centre.

Introducing a unique opportunity for buyers, this semi-detached development property is currently available for purchase. It is a three-bedroom house with one reception room, one kitchen, and one bathroom. The property is in B council tax band, making it an affordable choice for those looking to invest in property development.

The property does require renovation, offering a fantastic opportunity for those with a vision to transform it into a delightful family home or a profitable rental property. It provides an excellent foundation for those who wish to implement their own design ideas and create a space that truly reflects their individual taste and style.

The house benefits from three spacious bedrooms, each providing ample space for relaxation and privacy. The bathroom and kitchen are both functional and provide a solid base for modernisation. The reception room is a substantial size, perfect for both entertaining guests and enjoying quiet, cosy evenings in.

This is a promising listing for buyers who are not shying away from a renovation project and see the potential in this property. The semi-detached nature of this house also provides the chance for extension, subject to necessary planning permissions.

In summary, this property is a treasure trove of development potential. Whether you're a seasoned developer or a first-time buyer looking to put your stamp on a new home, this property could be the perfect project for you. It's not just a house; it's a chance to create a home from a blank canvas.

THIS PROPERTY CERTAINLY HAS THE 'WOW' FACTOR, AND MUST BE SEEN TO APPRECIATE WHAT'S ON OFFER....

Fully renovated by the current vendors, including extension and external rendering, creating a contemporary visual appeal....this bungalow provides a seamless combination of functional living space and modern, stylish design. Set across a single level, the thoughtfully designed layout includes a welcoming entrance hallway, enhanced by a striking feature beam. At the heart of the home lies an impressive open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area, complete with a sleek contemporary media wall and expansive bi-folding doors that seamlessly connect the indoors with the landscaped garden. The property offers three generously sized double bedrooms, including a principal suite boasting a stylish en-suite shower room. A modern family bathroom serves the remaining bedrooms, while a well-appointed utility room provides additional practical space.

The impeccably styled outdoor space to both the front and rear, combines modern landscaping with minimal maintenance, and the front also benefits from a gated double driveway.

Ideally positioned in a highly convenient location, this area offers excellent connectivity with swift road links to both the A1 and the City Centre. A range of local amenities are close at hand, including a leisure centre, a selection of nearby shops, and well-regarded schools, making it perfect for families and professionals alike. The area is also exceptionally well served by frequent bus routes, ensuring easy and reliable access to surrounding areas.

Call NOW to avoid missing out on this fantastic property.

Stunning & Well Extended, Semi Detached Family Home, Boasting Three Bedrooms, Beautiful Family Bathroom, Study, Living Room, Substantial Open Plan Kitchen, Living & Dining Room, Off Street Parking for Multiple Vehicles & a Generous Westerly Backing Garden!\r
\r
This fantastic family home is ideally located on Highfield Road, Westerhope. Highfield Road, which is situated just off Stamfordham Road, offers ease of access direct onto the A1 and is situated only a short drive away from Newcastle City Centre. The property is placed nearby some excellent schooling, as well as the amenities and shops that Westerhope has to offer.\r
\r
The property has recently undergone a fantastic transformation, having been fully renovated throughout to an exceptional standard. Most notably, a large rear extension has completely transformed the ground floor living of the property and now offers a wonderful entertaining space. There is also a new heating system, including boiler, pipe work, radiators and a new electrical DB. \r
\r
The internal accommodation comprises: Entrance vestibule Main hallway with staircase leading up to the first floor Lovely front living room with log burning stove Ground floor WC/cloaks cupboard To the rear of the ground floor is a stunning open plan kitchen, dining & living room with large glazed bifold doors onto the rear gardens, as well as two large roof lanterns. The kitchen is particularly impressive and boasts modern cabinetry/worktops, as well as integrated appliances throughout.\r
\r
The staircase then leads up to the first floor landing and gives access onto three double bedrooms The principal bedroom is a large double room with fitted wardrobes Bedroom two is a further large double room Bedroom three is a smaller double The landing then gives access onto a versatile room, which is ideal as a nursery or a home study Renovated family bathroom with three piece suite.\r
\r
Externally, the property is approached via a driveway which offers off street parking for two vehicles, as well as a front lawned garden To the rear is a substantial westerly backing garden, which is laid predominantly to lawn with a paved patio terrace and a pergola.\r
\r
Immaculately presented throughout, and offered to the market with NO ONWARD CHAIN, early viewings are strongly encouraged on this stunning home to truly appreciate the quality of accommodation on offer!\r
\r
Services: Mains gas, electricity, water & drainage Tenure: Freehold Council Tax: Band C Energy Performance Certificate: D

50% share of a 3 bedroom semi detached house situated within a cul-de-sac, ideal for a first time buyer. Benefitting from gas central heating and sealed unit double glazed windows. Briefly comprising of an Entrance Hallway with stairs to the first floor and laminate flooring, Downstairs w/c with a low level w/c, wall mounted hand wash basin, part tiled walls, spotlights to the ceiling and laminate flooring. Lounge with a modern electric fire and a storage cupboard, double doors leading to the open plan Kitchen Diner which has a range of wall and base units, work top surfaces, one and a half stainless steel sink and drainer unit, integrated appliances to include a washing machine, dishwasher, electric oven and hob with an extractor over, tiled splash back, tiled flooring and French doors to the rear garden. First Floor Landing with a loft hatch and a storage cupboard housing the Combi boiler. Bathroom comprising of a 'P' shaped bath with mains shower over and a shower screen, tiled splash back, low level w/c, vanity unit with a wash had basin, heated towel rail and spotlights to the ceiling. Bedroom 1 is to the rear aspect, Bedroom 2 and 3 are both to the front aspect.



Externally there is a block paved drive to the front giving parking for 2 cars, gate access to the side leading to the low maintenance garden with Astroturf and paved areas, there is also a shed.



Westerhope is a popular 'village' on the Western side of Newcastle, with good local amenities. There is easy access to the A1, with good road and public transport links into the city and other surrounding areas.



AGENT'S NOTE: This property is Affordable Housing under a Section 106 Agreement, to be sold at 50% of value. Buyers will need to demonstrate a 'Local Needs Qualification'. Please ask for details.

Our latest listing is a 3-bedroom mid-terrace house located in Newcastle Upon Tyne. It is conveniently close to essential amenities, offers strong potential for rental returns, and has a tenant in residence.\r
\r
For investors looking to expand their portfolio, this is a fantastic opportunity!\r
\r
This property features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a spacious lounge, and a kitchen. Additional features include a communal private parking and private front and rear gardens.\r
\r
Investment details\r
\r
It currently generates an annual gross income of Â£6,600, with tenants currently residing there. Considering the purchase price and the potential rental income that could be earned in future years, this will make for a worthwhile addition to an investor's property portfolio.\r
\r
Please see the Let Property Pack linked below for greater details on this property's investment potential.\r
\r
If you are interested, please call us.\r
\r
Tenancy Details\r
\r
The current tenants have been residing in the property for 5 years and have consistently paid their rent on time. They do not plan to move out and wish to continue their tenancy.\r
\r
Let Property is committed to facilitating a smooth transaction process between buyer and seller. To ensure maximum commitment to the sale from both parties, a Buyer's Premium will be applied to secure a property.

The Property
Located on a fantastic corner plot with huge potential to extend, a rare opportunity to purchase this well presented three bedroom semi detached family home with additional loft room and large driveway and garden. The property is situated in a popular residential location on Sunnyway in Blakelaw, Newcastle Upon Tyne and offers easy access to major bus and road links to Newcastle City Centre and motorways such as A1 and A69 across the region. There are also schools for all ages within close proximity and a shops, leisure facilities amongst other amenities close by, making this a perfect choice for families or even a wonderful First Time Buy.

Accommodation on offer briefly comprises; entrance hallway, lounge which is open plan to dining area, extended kitchen with utility area, ground floor W/C, modern shower room and study / playroom with French doors to rear garden, stairs to first floor landing, master bedroom with wardrobe, second double bedroom, third single bedroom, family bathroom and stairs to loft room with storage to eaves and velux windows allowing in loads of natural light. Externally there are generous gardens to front, rear and side, laid to lawn with paved and decked seating areas, shed, hedging, large driveway providing off street parking for multiple vehicles and given plot size, subject to planning offering potential to extend house or build large garage.

Early viewing is highly recommended to avoid disappointment.

Property Description Disclaimer

This is a general description of the property only, and is not intended to constitute part of an offer or contract. It has been verified by the seller(s), unless marked as 'draft'. Purplebricks conducts some valuations online and some of our customers prepare their own property descriptions, so if you decide to proceed with a viewing or an offer, please note this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and we may not have been able to visit the property to confirm it. If you require clarification on any point then please contact us, especially if youâre traveling some distance to view. All information should be checked by your solicitor prior to exchange of contracts.

Successful buyers will be required to complete anti-money laundering and proof of funds checks. Our partner, Lifetime Legal Limited, will carry out the initial checks on our behalf. The current non-refundable cost is Â£80 inc. VAT per offer. Youâll need to pay this to Lifetime Legal and complete all checks before we can issue a memorandum of sale. The cost includes obtaining relevant data and any manual checks and monitoring which might be required, and includes a range of benefits. Purplebricks will receive some of the fee taken by Lifetime Legal to compensate for its role in providing these checks.

MAIN DESCRIPTION\r
Fantastic and deceptively spacious extended semi detached bungalow occupying a corner plot in this popular cul-de-sac. The accommodation offers flexible and versitile living space for an array of potential purchasers. \r
Currently one bedroom is used as a home office / hobbie room. The living room is to the front of the property and offers a stylish family living space with bay window. To the rear there is a good sized dining room with French doors into the conservatory which in turn leads to the well presented low maintenance rear garden. \r
The kitchen offers a good selection of units with granite worktops and intergrated appliances, there is also a very useful separate utility room. The refitted bathroom offers elegant and stylish facilities. A staircase from the hall lead to the upstairs bedroom which has the benefit of an en suite shower room and useful walk in storage accessed from the first floor landing. \r
Externally to the front elevation is a block paved driveway offering parking for more than one car and leading up to a single garage with electric roller shutter door also a low maintenace gravelled garden. To the rear is a fenced garden with two patio areas with gravel feature and mature planting. A perfect, private outdoor area in which to relax. \r
\r
There are numerous bus routes and transport links in the area giving access to the city centre. The A1 and A69 are both close at hand linking to the central motorway network.\r
\r
ENTRANCE LOBBY\r
3' 10\" x 3' 10\" (1.188m x 1.179m)\r
The bungalow is accessed via a partially glazed UPVC front door that leads into the entrance lobby with laminate flooring and glazed internal door. \r
\r
HALLWAY\r
13' 2\" x 17' 1\" x 8' 2\" (4.015m x 5.227m x 2.508m) \r
The L shaped hallway is tastefully decorated and retains the original picture rail. With laminate flooring and warmed via two central heating radiators. Staircase leading to the first floor landing. \r
\r
LIVING ROOM\r
16' 6\" x 14' 4\" (5.052m x 4.374m) \r
Beautifully presented living room which has tasteful decor and laminate flooring. The focal point of the room is a recess within the chimney breast which houses a log burner with hearth. The room has a double glazed bay window with fitted blinds overlooking the front elevation, picture rail and central heating radiator. \r
\r
DINING ROOM\r
14' 2\" x 11' 0\" (4.320m x 3.358m) \r
A good size second reception room with double glazed French doors allowing access into the conservatory. This versitile room is light and airy and also has ornate cornicing, picture rail and is warmed by a central heating radiator. The property has laminate flooring. \r
\r
CONSERVATORY\r
12' 1\" x 9' 10\" (3.708m x 3.004m) \r
A lovely addition to the property overlooking the rear garden. With tiled flooring, fitted wall lights and external door to the rear elevation. Fitted blinds to both the roof and windows. \r
\r
KITCHEN\r
12' 1\" x 10' 6\" (3.691m x 3.220m)\r
Beautifully presented room fitted with an excellent range of wall and base kitchen units and drawers with granite work surfaces and splash back. Integrated double oven, hob and extractor hood, dish washer and fridge freezer. Brick feature wall, dowlights to the ceiling and warmed by a central heating radiator. The kitchen also has built in storage cupboards, picture rail and a fully tiled floor. A double glazed window offers garden views to the rear elevation. \r
\r
BEDROOM TWO \r
16' 5\" x 11' 10\" (5.011m x 3.610m) \r
A good size double bedroom with a double glazed bay window to the front elevation. Fitted with an excellent range of wardrobes, picture rail and warmed via a double central heating radiator. Fitted blinds and laminate flooring. \r
\r
BEDROOM THREE\r
9' 10\" x 7' 8\" (3.000m x 2.3610m) \r
A lovely bedroom / hobbie room / home office with a double glazed window to the side elevation also double glazed patio doors. Warmed via a double central heating radiator, down lights to the ceiling, laminate flooring and fitted blinds. \r
\r
UTILITY ROOM\r
6' 9\" x 5' 5\" (2.059m x 1.667m) \r
Fitted with a range of wall and base kitchen units with contrasting work surfaces. Stainless sink and drainer unit also plumbing for a washing machine.. With partially tiled walls, tiled flooring, down lights to the ceiling and extractor fan. The utility room is fitted with a double central heating radiator. \r
\r
BATHROOM\r
10' 6\" x 5' 6\" (3.225m x 1.690m) \r
Stylish and elegant refitted bathroom comprising white double ended bath with overhead rainfall shower and glass shower screen. A fitted vanity unit incorporating hand basin and storage also a back to the wall WC. The bathroom has a double glazed window, chrome towel warmer, extractor fan, down lights and blinds. With partially tiled walls and tiled flooring. \r
\r
FIRST FLOOR LANDING\r
2' 11\" x 3' 2\" (0.914m x 0.969m) \r
Carpeted stairs and landing. Walk in cupboard/wardrobe 5' 6\" x 5' 0\" (1.701m x 1.525m) with shelves and lighting. \r
\r
BEDROOM ONE\r
17' 11\" x 17' 6\" (5.468m x 5.336m) \r
Beautifully presented double bedroom with two Velux windows, neutrally decorated and fitted carpet. The bedroom is warmed by a double radiator and storage within the eaves. Door into the ensuite. \r
\r
ENSUITE\r
The ensuite comprises tiled shower cubical, pedestal hand basin with tiled splash back and low level WC. The room has a Velux window, white towel warmer, down lights to the ceiling, extractor fan and laminate flooring. \r
\r
GARAGE\r
19' 11\" x 15' 3\" (6.095m x 4.651m) \r
With electric roller shutter door, power and light. \r
\r
EXTERNALLY\r
Externally to the front elevation is a block paved driveway offering parking for more than one car also a low maintenace gravelled garden. To the rear is a fenced garden with two patio areas with gravel feature and mature planting. \r
\r
DISCLAIMER\r
These details have been prepared by our agency staff using both information provided to us by the vendor and following internal inspection. Please be advised particulars may still be awaiting verification and approval from the vendors and therefore should not be relied for anything other than general information. Fixtures and fittings included are to be agreed with the vendor and any photographs or mention of fitted appliances does not imply they are in working order. sale_listings.description:
An impressive semi detached family residence, this beautiful home is set within a sought after residential location and combines timeless character with stylish modern living. The property retains some traditional features that are seamlessly complemented by modern fixtures and fittings, creating a home that is both elegant and practical.

Upon entering, you are welcomed into a spacious hallway that sets the tone for the accommodation within. The living space is both versatile and inviting, beginning with a stunning lounge that offers an inviting and comfortable retreat. The separate dining room is a true highlight of the home, enhanced by a charming bay window, period features such as coving to the ceiling, a central ceiling rose, and to the chimney breast, there is a decorative feature fire surround, making this the perfect room for both family meals and entertaining guests.

The outstanding fitted kitchen has been designed with both style and functionality in mind, offering an extensive range of units paired with sleek worktops and built in cooking appliances. A practical utility room and a convenient downstairs WC further enhance the ground floor layout, providing excellent everyday usability for modern family living.

To the first floor, the property continues to impress with three generously proportioned bedrooms, each offering comfortable living space and flexibility of use. The family bathroom is truly striking, stylishly appointed and features a luxurious walk-in shower, a separate bath, and modern sanitary ware cleverly integrated into vanity storage units, ensuring both practicality and elegance. From the bathroom, a door provides access onto the roof of the kitchen, whichâsubject to the necessary building regulation approvalâoffers the exciting potential to be transformed into a roof terrace, creating an additional outdoor retreat.

Externally, the home enjoys attractive and low-maintenance outdoor areas. To the front, a neat town-style garden sets an inviting first impression. To the rear, an enclosed garden provides the perfect balance of relaxation and entertainment space, featuring an artificial lawn for year-round greenery alongside a paved patio area ideal for outdoor dining and family gatherings.

Perfectly located, the property is ideally placed for convenient access to a wide range of local shops, schools, and everyday amenities. Transport links and services provide commuter links to the surrounding areas, making this a superb choice for families and professionals alike.

This substantial semi-detached home offers character, space, and a desirable locationâmaking it a property not to be missed.
